Description: Bimorph piezoelectric actuator 2mm width × 28mm length cantilever, 0.7mm stroke, 100VDC nominal drive
Notes: Custom OEM $2.00 @ 1K+ (12-week lead, MOQ 1000). NO COTS available. Critical width ≤2.3mm (from 2.5mm pitch - 1.5mm dot ÷ 2). 28mm length for 0.7mm stroke @ 100V.
Also available in SOIC/QFN for SMT

Description: High-voltage driver module: 8× MOSFETs (STD14NM60N 600V) + 4× gate drivers (TC4427) + support components
Notes: NO integrated 8-channel 100V driver exists. Discrete solution: 8× STD14NM60N MOSFETs ($0.65 ea) + 4× TC4427 dual gate drivers ($1.50 ea) + passives (~$2) = $13/module. 192 actuators ÷ 8 = 24 modules needed.
Pilot only, ~200×100×25mm, switch to injection mold for production

Bulk cap for driver IC power rail filtering (EMI suppression, inductive kickback energy absorption). Place one per ULN2803A IC (24 total for ARCH_SOL_ECO, 3 ICs; varies by architecture). NFR-EMI-001 compliance.
Ceramic bypass for driver IC (EMI suppression, high-frequency decoupling). Place one per ULN2803A IC (24 total for ARCH_PIEZO_ECO/DLX, 3 for ARCH_SOL_ECO). NFR-EMI-001 compliance.
Need UL listed pack, check lead time

Description: Fuel gauge IC, I2C, SOC estimation
Boost conv 3.7V→100V for piezo drive from Li-ion (capacitive load)
Notes: TPS61088 maxes at ~40V! Need specialized HV boost (e.g., TPS61391 or flyback topology). Battery-powered 100V generation adds efficiency constraints. COST ESTIMATE $6.50.
